extendedInfo.description: A beautiful remake of the classic game called Lines. The goal of the game is to place lines with five or more balls of the same color. After placing a line, the line disappears. Placing lines helps you to keep a game board clean, because every time when you move a ball, three new balls appear.In the game you will find:- Outstanding graphics and animations designed for HD displays- UNDO ball move button, to help you correct your mistakes- Google Play Game Services integration to store your best scores- Different sets of ball colors and game board sizes- COMBOS that will increase your score- Beautiful tutorial to help you understand rules of the game- Sweet sounds
